response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive opportunity for you. I trust that you will find the product invaluable and worth every penny. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
